name: Rowlet
desc: Rowlet is a Grass/Flying type Pokémon. It has the abilities Overgrow and Long Reach. It is strong against Water, Electric, Ground, and Fighting types but weak against Ice, Rock, Electric, and Psychic types.

name: Dartrix
desc: Dartrix is a Grass/Flying type Pokémon. It has the abilities Overgrow and Long Reach. It is strong against Water, Electric, Ground, and Fighting types but weak against Ice, Rock, Electric, and Psychic types.

name: Decidueye
desc: Decidueye is a Grass/Ghost type Pokémon. It has the abilities Overgrow and Long Reach. It is strong against Water, Electric, Ground, Grass, Dark, and Psychic types but weak against Ice, Rock, Ghost, Flying, and Fire types.

name: Litten
desc: Litten is a Fire type Pokémon. It has the abilities Blaze and Intimidate. It is strong against Grass, Ice, Bug, Steel, and Fairy types but weak against Water, Rock, and Ground types.

name: Torracat
desc: Torracat is a Fire type Pokémon. It has the abilities Blaze and Intimidate. It is strong against Grass, Ice, Bug, Steel, and Fairy types but weak against Water, Rock, and Ground types.

name: Incineroar
desc: Incineroar is a Fire/Dark type Pokémon. It has the abilities Blaze and Intimidate. It is strong against Grass, Ice, Bug, Steel, Ghost, Dark, and Psychic types but weak against Water, Rock, Ground, Fighting, and Fairy types.

name: Popplio
desc: Popplio is a Water type Pokémon. It has the abilities Torrent and Liquid Voice. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but weak against Electric and Grass types.

name: Brionne
desc: Brionne is a Water type Pokémon. It has the abilities Torrent and Liquid Voice. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but weak against Electric and Grass types.

name: Primarina
desc: Primarina is a Water/Fairy type Pokémon. It has the abilities Torrent and Liquid Voice. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, Steel, Fighting, Dark, and Dragon types but weak against Electric and Grass types.

name: Pikipek
desc: Pikipek is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon. It has the abilities Keen Eye and Skill Link. It is strong against Grass, Bug, and Fighting types but weak against Electric, Ice, and Rock types.

name: Trumbeak
desc: Trumbeak is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon. It has the abilities Keen Eye and Skill Link. It is strong against Grass, Bug, and Fighting types but weak against Electric, Ice, and Rock types.

name: Toucannon
desc: Toucannon is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon. It has the abilities Keen Eye and Skill Link. It is strong against Grass, Bug, Fighting, and Bug types but weak against Electric, Ice, and Rock types.

name: Yungoos
desc: Yungoos is a Normal type Pokémon. It has the abilities Stakeout and Strong Jaw. It is strong against Ghost types but weak against Fighting types.

name: Gumshoos
desc: Gumshoos is a Normal type Pokémon. It has the abilities Stakeout and Strong Jaw. It is strong against Ghost types but weak against Fighting types.

name: Grubbin
desc:
Abilities: Swarm (Hidden Ability: None)
Strengths: Grubbin has an advantage against Grass, Psychic, and Dark types due to its Bug typing. Weaknesses: It's weak to Fire, Flying, and Rock-type moves.

name: Charjabug
desc:
Abilities: Battery (Hidden Ability: None)
Strengths: Charjabug is strong against Grass, Psychic, Electric, and Steel types. Weaknesses: It's weak to Fire and Rock-type moves.

name: Vikavolt
desc:
Abilities: Levitate (Hidden Ability: None)
Strengths: Vikavolt has an advantage against Grass, Psychic, Electric, Steel, and Flying types. Weaknesses: It's weak to Fire, Rock, and Ground-type moves.

name: Crabrawler
desc:
Abilities: Hyper Cutter (Hidden Ability: Iron Fist)
Strengths: Crabrawler is strong against Normal, Ice, Rock, Dark, and Steel types. Weaknesses: It's weak to Flying, Psychic, and Fairy-type moves.

name: Crabominable
desc:
Abilities: Hyper Cutter (Hidden Ability: Iron Fist)
Strengths: Crabominable has an advantage against Normal, Ice, Rock, Dark, Grass, and Ground types. Weaknesses: It's weak to Flying, Psychic, Fairy, Steel, and Fire-type moves.

forms.name: Oricorio
forms.desc:
Abilities: Dancer (Hidden Ability: None)
Strengths: Oricorio's Fire/Flying typing gives it an advantage against Grass, Bug, Ice, Steel, and Fighting types. Weaknesses: It's weak to Water and Electric-type moves.

forms.name: Oricorio
forms.desc:
Abilities: Dancer (Hidden Ability: None)
Strengths: Electric/Flying Oricorio has an advantage against Water and Flying types. Weaknesses: It's weak to Ice and Rock-type moves.

forms.name: Oricorio
forms.desc:
Abilities: Dancer (Hidden Ability: None)
Strengths: Psychic/Flying Oricorio is strong against Fighting and Poison types. Weaknesses: It's weak to Ghost, Dark, Electric, Ice, and Rock-type moves.

forms.name: Oricorio
forms.desc:
Abilities: Dancer (Hidden Ability: None)
Strengths: Ghost/Flying Oricorio has an advantage against Psychic and Fighting types. Weaknesses: It's weak to Dark, Electric, Ice, Ghost, and Rock-type moves.

name: Cutiefly
desc:
Abilities: Honey Gather (Hidden Ability: Shield Dust)
Strengths: Cutiefly is strong against Grass, Psychic, and Dark types due to its Bug/Fairy typing. Weaknesses: It's weak to Fire, Flying, Steel, Poison, and Rock-type moves.

name: Ribombee
desc:
Abilities: Honey Gather (Hidden Ability: Shield Dust)
Strengths: Ribombee shares the strengths of Cutiefly, being strong against Grass, Psychic, and Dark types. Weaknesses: It also shares the weaknesses of its pre-evolved form.

name: Rockruff
desc: Rockruff is a Rock type Pokémon. It has the abilities Keen Eye, Vital Spirit, and Steadfast. It is strong against Fire, Ice, Flying, Bug, and Normal types but weak against Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

forms.name: Lycanroc
forms.desc: Lycanroc (Dusk Form) is a Rock type Pokémon. It has the abilities Tough Claws and Counter. It is strong against Fire, Ice, Flying, Bug, and Normal types but weak against Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

forms.name: Lycanroc
forms.desc: Lycanroc (Midnight Form) is a Rock type Pokémon. It has the abilities Keen Eye and Vital Spirit. It is strong against Fire, Ice, Flying, Bug, and Normal types but weak against Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

forms.name: Lycanroc
forms.desc: Lycanroc (Midnight Form) is a Rock type Pokémon. It has the abilities Keen Eye and Vital Spirit. It is strong against Fire, Ice, Flying, Bug, and Normal types but weak against Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

forms.name: Wishiwashi School
forms.desc: Wishiwashi (School Form) is a Water type Pokémon. It has the ability Schooling. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but weak against Electric and Grass types.

forms.name: Wishiwashi
forms.desc: Wishiwashi (Solo Form) is a Water type Pokémon. It has the ability Schooling. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but weak against Electric and Grass types.

name: Mareanie
desc: Mareanie is a Poison/Water type Pokémon. It has the abilities Merciless and Limber. It is strong against Grass, Fairy, Bug, Poison, Steel, Ice, and Fire types but weak against Ground, Psychic, and Electric types.

name: Toxapex
desc: Toxapex is a Poison/Water type Pokémon. It has the abilities Merciless and Limber. It is strong against Grass, Fairy, Bug, Poison, Steel, Ice, and Fire types but weak against Ground, Psychic, and Electric types.

name: Mudbray
desc: Mudbray is a Ground type Pokémon. It has the abilities Own Tempo and Stamina. It is strong against Poison, Rock, Steel, Fire, Electric, and Fairy types but weak against Water, Grass, and Ice types.

name: Mudsdale
desc: Mudsdale is a Ground type Pokémon. It has the abilities Own Tempo and Stamina. It is strong against Poison, Rock, Steel, Fire, Electric, and Fairy types but weak against Water, Grass, and Ice types.

name: Dewpider
desc: Dewpider is a Water/Bug type Pokémon. It has the abilities Water Bubble and Water Absorb. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, Fighting, Ground, and Bug types but weak against Electric, Flying, and Rock types.

name: Araquanid
desc: Araquanid is a Water/Bug type Pokémon. It has the abilities Water Bubble and Water Absorb. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, Fighting, Ground, and Bug types but weak against Electric, Flying, and Rock types.

name: Fomantis
desc: Fomantis is a Grass type Pokémon. It has the abilities Leaf Guard and Contrary. It is strong against Water, Ground, and Rock types but weak against Fire, Ice, Poison, Bug, and Flying types.

name: Lurantis
desc: Lurantis is a Grass type Pokémon. It has the abilities Leaf Guard and Contrary. It is strong against Water, Ground, and Rock types but weak against Fire, Ice, Poison, Bug, and Flying types.

name: Morelull
desc: Morelull is a Grass/Fairy type Pokémon. It has the abilities Illuminate and Effect Spore. It is strong against Water, Ground, Fighting, Grass, Electric, Dark, and Dragon types but weak against Fire, Ice, Poison, Steel, and Flying types.

name: Shiinotic
desc: Shiinotic is a Grass/Fairy type Pokémon. It has the abilities Illuminate and Effect Spore. It is strong against Water, Ground, Fighting, Grass, Electric, Dark, and Dragon types but weak against Fire, Ice, Poison, Steel, and Flying types.

name: Salandit
desc: Salandit is a Poison/Fire type Pokémon. It has the abilities Corrosion and Oblivious. It is strong against Grass, Bug, Ice, Steel, and Fairy types but weak against Water, Rock, Ground, and Psychic types.

name: Salazzle
desc: Salazzle is a Poison/Fire type Pokémon. It has the abilities Corrosion and Oblivious. It is strong against Grass, Bug, Ice, Steel, and Fairy types but weak against Water, Rock, Ground, and Psychic types.

name: Stufful
desc: Stufful is a Normal/Fighting type Pokémon. It has the abilities Fluffy and Klutz. It is strong against Rock, Steel, Ice, Normal, Dark, and Steel types but weak against Flying, Psychic, and Fairy types.

name: Bewear
desc: Bewear is a Normal/Fighting type Pokémon. It has the abilities Fluffy and Klutz. It is strong against Rock, Steel, Ice, Normal, Dark, and Steel types but weak against Flying, Psychic, and Fairy types.

name: Bounsweet
desc: Bounsweet is a Grass type Pokémon. It has the abilities Leaf Guard and Oblivious. It is strong against Water, Ground, and Rock types but weak against Fire, Ice, Poison, Bug, and Flying types.

name: Steenee
desc: Steenee is a Grass type Pokémon. It has the abilities Leaf Guard and Oblivious. It is strong against Water, Ground, and Rock types but weak against Fire, Ice, Poison, Bug, and Flying types.

name: Tsareena
desc: Tsareena is a Grass type Pokémon. It has the abilities Leaf Guard and Queenly Majesty. It is strong against Water, Ground, and Rock types but weak against Fire, Ice, Poison, Bug, and Flying types.

name: Comfey
desc: Comfey is a Fairy type Pokémon. It has the abilities Flower Veil and Triage. It is strong against Fighting, Bug, and Dragon types but weak against Poison and Steel types.

name: Oranguru
desc: Oranguru is a Normal/Psychic type Pokémon. It has the abilities Inner Focus and Telepathy. It is strong against Fighting and Poison types but weak against Bug, Dark, and Ghost types.

name: Passimian
desc: Passimian is a Fighting type Pokémon. It has the abilities Receiver and Defiant. It is strong against Normal, Ice, Rock, Dark, and Steel types but weak against Flying, Psychic, and Fairy types.

name: Wimpod
desc: Wimpod is a Bug/Water type Pokémon. It has the abilities Wimp Out and Emergency Exit. It is strong against Grass, Electric, Fighting, Ground, and Rock types but weak against Water, Flying, and Electric types.

name: Golisopod
desc: Golisopod is a Bug/Water type Pokémon. It has the abilities Emergency Exit and Water Bubble. It is strong against Grass, Electric, Fighting, Ground, and Rock types but weak against Water, Flying, and Electric types.

name: Sandygast
desc: Sandygast is a Ghost/Ground type Pokémon. It has the abilities Water Compaction and Sand Veil. It is strong against Poison, Bug, Rock, and Electric types but weak against Water, Ice, Grass, and Dark types.

name: Palossand
desc: Palossand is a Ghost/Ground type Pokémon. It has the abilities Water Compaction and Sand Veil. It is strong against Poison, Bug, Rock, and Electric types but weak against Water, Ice, Grass, and Dark types.

name: Pyukumuku
desc: Pyukumuku is a Water type Pokémon. It has the abilities Innards Out and Unaware. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but weak against Electric and Grass types.

name: Type: Null
desc: Type: Null is a Normal type Pokémon. It is a Legendary Pokémon.

name: Silvally
desc: Silvally is a Normal type Pokémon. It is a Legendary Pokémon.

name: Minior
desc: Minior is a Rock/Flying type Pokémon.

name: Komala
desc: Komala is a Normal type Pokémon. It has the ability Comatose. It is strong against Ghost types but weak against Fighting types.

name: Turtonator
desc: Turtonator is a Fire/Dragon type Pokémon. It has the ability Shell Armor. It is strong against Bug, Steel, Grass, Ice, and Fairy types but weak against Water, Rock, and Dragon types.

name: Togedemaru
desc: Togedemaru is an Electric/Steel type Pokémon. It has the abilities Iron Barbs and Lightning Rod. It is strong against Electric, Flying, Steel, Grass, Ice, Psychic, Bug, Rock, Fairy, and Dragon types but weak against Ground and Fighting types.

name: Mimikyu
desc: Mimikyu is a Ghost/Fairy type Pokémon. It has the ability Disguise. It is strong against Normal, Fighting, and Dragon types but weak against Ghost and Steel types.

name: Bruxish
desc: Bruxish is a Water/Psychic type Pokémon. It has the abilities Dazzling and Strong Jaw. It is strong against Fire, Rock, Ground, and Fighting types but weak against Electric, Grass, Bug, Ghost, and Dark types.

name: Drampa
desc: Drampa is a Normal/Dragon type Pokémon. It has the abilities Berserk and Sap Sipper. It is strong against Electric, Grass, Water, and Fighting types but weak against Ice, Dragon, Fairy, and Rock types.

name: Dhelmise
desc: Dhelmise is a Ghost/Grass type Pokémon. It has the abilities Steelworker and Heavymetal. It is strong against Water, Electric, Grass, and Ground types but weak against Fire, Ice, Flying, Poison, Bug, and Ghost types.

name: Jangmo-o
desc: Abilities: Jangmo-o has the Bulletproof and Soundproof abilities. Strengths: It excels against other Dragon types. Weaknesses: Jangmo-o is weak against Fairy and Ice types.

name: Hakamo-o
desc: Abilities: Hakamo-o has the Bulletproof and Soundproof abilities. Strengths: It's strong against Normal, Ice, Dark, Rock, and Steel types. Weaknesses: Vulnerable to Fairy, Flying, Psychic, and Dragon types.

name: Kommo-o
desc: Abilities: Kommo-o has the Bulletproof and Soundproof abilities. Strengths: It excels against Electric, Bug, Rock, Dark, Normal, Ice, and Steel types. Weaknesses: Kommo-o is weak to Dragon, Fairy, Psychic, and Flying types.

name: Tapu Koko
desc: Ability: Tapu Koko has the Electric Surge ability, summoning Electric Terrain. Strengths: It's strong against Water and Flying types. Weaknesses: Tapu Koko is susceptible to Ground and Poison types.

name: Tapu Lele
desc: Ability: Tapu Lele has the Psychic Surge ability, creating Psychic Terrain. Strengths: It excels against Fighting and Poison types. Weaknesses: Vulnerable to Steel and Ghost types.

name: Tapu Bulu
desc: Ability: Tapu Bulu has the Grassy Surge ability, setting up Grassy Terrain. Strengths: It's strong against Ground, Rock, and Water types. Weaknesses: Tapu Bulu faces weaknesses against Ice and Poison types.

name: Tapu Fini
desc: Ability: Tapu Fini has the Misty Surge ability, creating Misty Terrain. Strengths: It excels against Fire and Steel types. Weaknesses: Vulnerable to Electric and Poison types.

name: Cosmog
desc: Abilities: Cosmog has no known abilities. Strengths: It doesn't possess strengths. Weaknesses: Weak to Bug, Ghost, and Dark types.

name: Cosmoem
desc: Abilities: Cosmoem has no known abilities. Strengths: It doesn't possess strengths due to its high defense. Weaknesses: Not known for offensive capabilities.

name: Solgaleo
desc: Ability: Solgaleo has the Full Metal Body ability, preventing its stats from being lowered. Strengths: It excels against Ice, Rock, Fairy, Normal, Grass, Psychic, Steel, and Dragon types. Weaknesses: Solgaleo is weak to Ground, Ghost, and Dark types.

name: Lunala
desc: Ability: Lunala has the Shadow Shield ability, reducing damage from attacks when at full HP. Strengths: It's strong against Psychic and Ghost types. Weaknesses: Vulnerable to Dark and Ghost types.

name: Nihilego
desc: Abilities: Nihilego has the Beast Boost ability, boosting its highest stat after knocking out an opponent. Strengths: It excels against Flying, Bug, Poison, Fire, and Ice types. Weaknesses: Nihilego is weak to Ground, Steel, Psychic, Water, and Dark types.

name: Buzzwole
desc: Buzzwole, a Bug/Fighting type Pokémon, has the Beast Boost ability, which boosts its highest stat after knocking out an opponent.

name: Pheromosa
desc: Pheromosa, a Bug/Fighting type Pokémon, is known for its incredible speed and the Beast Boost ability that boosts its highest stat after defeating an opponent.

name: Xurkitree
desc: Xurkitree is an Electric type Pokémon with the ability Beast Boost, boosting its highest stat after taking down an opponent.

name: Celesteela
desc: Celesteela, a Steel/Flying type Pokémon, boasts the Beast Boost ability, increasing its highest stat after it defeats an opponent.

name: Kartana
desc: Kartana, a Grass/Steel type Pokémon, possesses the Beast Boost ability, enhancing its highest stat when it takes down an opponent.

name: Guzzlord
desc: Guzzlord is a Dark/Dragon type Pokémon with the Beast Boost ability, which increases its highest stat after defeating a foe.

name: Necrozma
desc: Necrozma is a Legendary Psychic type Pokémon. It has a unique form called Ultra Necrozma when it absorbs light energy.

name: Magearna
desc: Magearna is a Legendary Steel/Fairy type Pokémon. It has the ability Soul-Heart, which boosts its Special Attack when an ally faints.

name: Marshadow
desc: Marshadow is a Legendary Fighting/Ghost type Pokémon. It has the ability Technician and can use its exclusive Z-Move, Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike.

name: Caterpie
desc: Caterpie is a Bug type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Butterfree.

name: Metapod
desc: Metapod is a Bug type Pokémon and the intermediate stage in Caterpie's evolution. It's known for its Harden ability.

name: Butterfree
desc: Butterfree is a Bug/Flying type Pokémon and the final evolution of Caterpie. It can use moves like Sleep Powder and Psychic.

name: Rattata
desc: Rattata is a Normal type Pokémon with an Alolan form that becomes Dark/Normal type. It evolves into Raticate.

name: Raticate
desc: Raticate is a Normal type Pokémon and the evolved form of Rattata. It also has an Alolan form, which is Dark/Normal type.

name: Spearow
desc: Spearow is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon, known for its speed and agility. It evolves into Fearow.

name: Fearow
desc: Fearow is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon and the evolved form of Spearow. It has a keen eye and is an adept hunter.

name: Pikachu
desc: Pikachu is an Electric type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Raichu.

name: Raichu
desc: Raichu is an Electric type Pokémon. In the Alola region, it has an Electric/Psychic Alolan form.

name: Sandshrew
desc: Sandshrew is a Ground type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Sandslash. It has an Alolan form with Ice/Steel typing.

name: Sandslash
desc: Sandslash is a Ground type Pokémon and the evolved form of Sandshrew. It also has an Alolan form with Ice/Steel typing.

name: Clefairy
desc: Clefairy is a Fairy type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Clefable.

name: Clefable
desc: Clefable is a Fairy type Pokémon and the evolved form of Clefairy.

name: Vulpix
desc: Vulpix is a Fire type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Ninetales. It has an Alolan form with Ice typing.

name: Ninetales
desc: Ninetales is a Fire type Pokémon and the evolved form of Vulpix. It also has an Alolan form with Ice/Fairy typing.

name: Jigglypuff
desc: Jigglypuff is a Normal/Fairy type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Wigglytuff.

name: Wigglytuff
desc: Wigglytuff is a Normal/Fairy type Pokémon and the evolved form of Jigglypuff.

name: Zubat
desc: Zubat is a Poison/Flying type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Golbat.

name: Golbat
desc: Golbat is a Poison/Flying type Pokémon and the evolved form of Zubat.

name: Paras
desc: Paras is a Bug/Grass type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Parasect.

name: Parasect
desc: Parasect is a Bug/Grass type Pokémon and the evolved form of Paras.

name: Diglett
desc: Diglett is a Ground type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Dugtrio. It also has an Alolan form with Ground/Steel typing.

name: Dugtrio
desc: Dugtrio is a Ground type Pokémon and the evolved form of Diglett. It also has an Alolan form with Ground/Steel typing.

name: Meowth
desc: Meowth is a Normal type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Persian. It also has an Alolan form with Dark typing.

name: Persian
desc: Persian is a Normal type Pokémon and the evolved form of Meowth. It also has an Alolan form with Dark typing.

name: Psyduck
desc: Psyduck is a Water type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Golduck.

name: Golduck
desc: Golduck is a Water type Pokémon and the evolved form of Psyduck.

name: Mankey
desc: Mankey is a Fighting type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Primeape.

name: Primeape
desc: Primeape is a Fighting type Pokémon and the evolved form of Mankey.

name: Growlithe
desc: Growlithe is a Fire type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Arcanine.

name: Arcanine
desc: Arcanine is a Fire type Pokémon and the evolved form of Growlithe.

name: Poliwag
desc: Poliwag is a Water type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Poliwhirl.

name: Poliwhirl
desc: Poliwhirl is a Water type Pokémon and the evolved form of Poliwag.

name: Poliwrath
desc: Poliwrath is a Water/Fighting type Pokémon.

name: Abra
desc: Abra is a Psychic type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Kadabra.

name: Kadabra
desc: Kadabra is a Psychic type Pokémon and the evolved form of Abra.

name: Alakazam
desc: Alakazam is a Psychic type Pokémon. It also has a Mega Evolution form with Psychic typing.

name: Machop
desc: Machop is a Fighting type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Machoke.

name: Machoke
desc: Machoke is a Fighting type Pokémon and the evolved form of Machop.

name: Machamp
desc: Machamp is a Fighting type Pokémon and the evolved form of Machoke.

name: Tentacool
desc: Tentacool is a Water/Poison type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Tentacruel.

name: Tentacruel
desc: Tentacruel is a Water/Poison type Pokémon and the evolved form of Tentacool.

name: Geodude
desc: Geodude is a Rock/Ground type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Graveler. It also has an Alolan form with Rock/Electric typing.

name: Graveler
desc: Graveler is a Rock/Ground type Pokémon and the evolved form of Geodude. It also has an Alolan form with Rock/Electric typing.

name: Golem
desc: Golem is a Rock/Ground type Pokémon and the evolved form of Graveler. It also has an Alolan form with Rock/Electric typing.

name: Slowpoke
desc: Slowpoke is a Water/Psychic type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Slowbro.

name: Slowbro
desc: Slowbro is a Water/Psychic type Pokémon and the evolved form of Slowpoke. It also has a Mega Evolution form with Water/Psychic typing.

name: Magnemite
desc: Magnemite is an Electric/Steel type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Magneton.

name: Magneton
desc: Magneton is an Electric/Steel type Pokémon and the evolved form of Magnemite.

name: Grimer
desc: Grimer is a Poison type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Muk. It also has an Alolan form with Poison/Dark typing.

name: Muk
desc: Muk is a Poison type Pokémon and the evolved form of Grimer. It also has an Alolan form with Poison/Dark typing.

name: Shellder
desc: Shellder is a Water type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Cloyster.

name: Cloyster
desc: Cloyster is a Water/Ice type Pokémon and the evolved form of Shellder.

name: Gastly
desc: Gastly is a Ghost/Poison type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Haunter.

name: Haunter
desc: Haunter is a Ghost/Poison type Pokémon and the evolved form of Gastly.

name: Gengar
desc: Gengar is a Ghost/Poison type Pokémon. It also has a Mega Evolution form with Ghost/Poison typing.

name: Grimer
desc: Grimer is a Poison type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Muk. It also has an Alolan form with Poison/Dark typing.

name: Muk
desc: Muk is a Poison type Pokémon and the evolved form of Grimer. It also has an Alolan form with Poison/Dark typing.

name: Shellder
desc: Shellder is a Water type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Cloyster.

name: Cloyster
desc: Cloyster is a Water/Ice type Pokémon and the evolved form of Shellder.

name: Gastly
desc: Gastly is a Ghost/Poison type Pokémon and the pre-evolution of Haunter.

name: Haunter
desc: Haunter is a Ghost/Poison type Pokémon and the evolved form of Gastly.

name: Gengar
desc: Gengar is a Ghost/Poison type Pokémon. It also has a Mega Evolution form with Ghost/Poison typing.

name: Drowzee
desc: Abilities: 'Insomnia' and 'Forewarn.' Strengths: Psychic-type Pokémon like Drowzee are strong against Fighting and Poison types. Weaknesses: They are weak to Bug, Ghost, and Dark types.

name: Hypno
desc: Abilities: 'Insomnia' and 'Forewarn' (regular form), 'Inner Focus' (Hidden Ability). Strengths: Hypno shares the strengths and weaknesses of Psychic-types, being strong against Fighting and Poison types. Weaknesses: It is weak to Bug, Ghost, and Dark types.

name: Exeggcute
desc: Abilities: 'Chlorophyll' and 'Harvest' (Hidden Ability). Strengths: Grass and Psychic typing gives Exeggcute an advantage over Water, Ground, and Rock types. Weaknesses: It is weak to Bug, Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, and Ghost types.

name: Exeggutor
desc: Abilities: 'Chlorophyll' and 'Harvest' (regular form), 'Frisk' (Hidden Ability). Strengths: Grass and Psychic typing makes Exeggutor strong against Water, Ground, and Rock types. Weaknesses: It is weak to Bug, Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, Ghost, and Dragon types.

name: Cubone
desc: Abilities: 'Rock Head' and 'Lightning Rod' (Hidden Ability). Strengths: Cubone's Ground typing gives it an advantage against Electric, Rock, and Steel types. Weaknesses: It is weak to Water, Ice, and Grass types.

name: Marowak
desc: Abilities: 'Rock Head' and 'Lightning Rod' (regular form), 'Cursed Body' (Hidden Ability). Strengths: Ground typing makes Marowak strong against Electric, Rock, and Steel types. Weaknesses: It is weak to Water, Ice, Grass, Fire, Ghost, and Dark types.

name: Chansey
desc: Abilities: 'Natural Cure' and 'Serene Grace' (Hidden Ability). Strengths: Chansey's incredible Special Defense and HP make it a fantastic special wall. Weaknesses: It has a weakness to Fighting-type moves and is vulnerable to physical attackers.

name: Kangaskhan
desc: Abilities: 'Early Bird' and 'Scrappy' (Hidden Ability). Strengths: Kangaskhan's Mega Evolution gains 'Parental Bond,' allowing it to attack twice per turn, making it a powerful physical attacker. Weaknesses: It is weak to Fighting, Fairy, and Ground types.

name: Goldeen
desc: Goldeen, a Water-type Pokémon, has the ability to Swift Swim, which doubles its speed in rainy weather. It is strong against Fire and Ground types but weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Seaking
desc: Seaking, also a Water-type Pokémon, shares the Swift Swim ability with Goldeen. It excels against Fire and Ground types but is vulnerable to Electric and Grass types.

name: Staryu
desc: Staryu, a Water-type Pokémon, has the Natural Cure ability, allowing it to heal status conditions when switched out. It resists Fire and Water types but is weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Starmie
desc: Starmie, a dual-type Water and Psychic Pokémon, possesses the Natural Cure ability and strong Water-type moves. It has resistance against Fire, Water, Psychic, and Ice types but is weak to Electric, Grass, Bug, Ghost, Dark, and Electric types.

name: Scyther
desc: Scyther, a dual-type Bug and Flying Pokémon, has the Swarm ability, boosting its Bug-type moves in a pinch. It excels against Grass, Psychic, and Dark types but is weak to Rock, Electric, Fire, Flying, and Ice types.

name: Electabuzz
desc: Electabuzz, an Electric-type Pokémon, boasts the Static ability, which may paralyze opponents on contact. It's strong against Water and Flying types but vulnerable to Ground types.

name: Magmar
desc: Magmar, a Fire-type Pokémon, possesses the Flame Body ability, potentially burning foes on contact. It excels against Bug, Steel, Grass, Ice, and Bug types but is weak to Water and Rock types.

name: Pinsir
desc: Pinsir, a Bug-type Pokémon, can Mega Evolve into Pinsir Mega, gaining the Aerilate ability that turns Normal-type moves into Flying-type moves. Both forms have a strong advantage against Grass and Psychic types but are weak to Rock, Electric, Fire, Flying, and Ice types.

name: Tauros
desc: Tauros, a Normal-type Pokémon, has the Intimidate ability, lowering the opponent's Attack when it enters battle. It excels against other Normal types but is weak to Fighting types.

name: Magikarp
desc: Magikarp, a Water-type Pokémon, may seem weak, but it evolves into the powerful Gyarados. It is strong against Fire, Ground, and Rock types but weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Gyarados
desc: Gyarados, a dual-type Water and Flying Pokémon, can Mega Evolve into Gyarados Mega, gaining the Mold Breaker ability. Both forms have strengths against Fire, Ground, Fighting, and Bug types but are weak to Electric and Rock types.

name: Lapras
desc: Lapras, a dual-type Water and Ice Pokémon, boasts high HP and strong Ice-type moves. It excels against Grass, Ground, Flying, and Dragon types but is weak to Electric, Rock, Fighting, and Grass types.

name: Ditto
desc: Ditto, a Normal-type Pokémon, has the unique ability to Transform into its opponent, copying its abilities, moves, and type. It has no specific strengths or weaknesses as its effectiveness depends on the opponent it faces.

name: Eevee
desc: Eevee, a Normal-type Pokémon, is known for its ability to evolve into various different forms based on conditions. It has no specific strengths or weaknesses as its effectiveness depends on its evolved form.

name: Vaporeon
desc: Vaporeon, a Water-type Pokémon, has the ability Water Absorb, which allows it to heal when hit by Water-type moves. It excels against Fire and Ground types but is weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Jolteon
desc: Jolteon, an Electric-type Pokémon, possesses the Volt Absorb ability, granting it immunity to Electric-type moves and healing from them. It is strong against Water and Flying types but vulnerable to Ground types.

name: Flareon
desc: Flareon, a Fire-type Pokémon, has the Flash Fire ability, making it immune to Fire-type moves and boosting its Fire-type moves' power. It excels against Grass, Bug, Ice, and Steel types but is weak to Water and Rock types.

name: Porygon
desc: Porygon, a Normal-type Pokémon, has the Download ability, which boosts either its Attack or Special Attack based on the opponent's defenses. It has no specific strengths or weaknesses as its effectiveness depends on its moveset.

name: Aerodactyl
desc: Aerodactyl, a dual-type Rock and Flying Pokémon, can Mega Evolve into Aerodactyl Mega, gaining the Tough Claws ability that boosts the power of contact moves. Both forms have a strong advantage against Bug, Grass, and Fighting types but are weak to Electric, Ice, Rock, Water, and Steel types.

name: Snorlax
desc: Snorlax, a Normal-type Pokémon, is known for its high HP and great physical strength. It excels against other Normal types but is weak to Fighting types.

name: Dratini
desc: Dratini, a Dragon-type Pokémon, is the first stage of the powerful Dragonite. It is strong against other Dragon types but is weak to Ice and Fairy types.

name: Dragonair
desc: Dragonair, a Dragon-type Pokémon, is the middle stage in the evolution line leading to Dragonite. It is strong against other Dragon types but is weak to Ice and Fairy types.

name: Dragonite
desc: Dragonite, a dual-type Dragon and Flying Pokémon, is known for its versatility and powerful moves. It excels against other Dragon types but is weak to Ice, Rock, Fairy, and Electric types.

name: Ledyba
desc: Ledyba, a dual-type Bug and Flying Pokémon, is the first stage of its evolution line. It is strong against Grass, Fighting, and Bug types but is weak to Rock, Electric, Fire, Flying, and Ice types.

name: Ledian
desc: Ledian, a dual-type Bug and Flying Pokémon, is the evolved form of Ledyba. It excels against Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Psychic types but is weak to Rock, Electric, Fire, Flying, and Ice types.

name: Spinarak
desc: Spinarak, a dual-type Bug and Poison Pokémon, is the first stage of its evolution line. It is strong against Grass, Fighting, and Bug types but is weak to Rock, Electric, Fire, Flying, and Psychic types.

name: Ariados
desc: Ariados, a dual-type Bug and Poison Pokémon, is the evolved form of Spinarak. It excels against Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Psychic types but is weak to Rock, Electric, Fire, Flying, and Psychic types.

name: Crobat
desc: Crobat, a dual-type Poison and Flying Pokémon, has the ability Inner Focus, preventing it from flinching. It excels against Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Fairy types but is weak to Electric and Psychic types.

name: Chinchou
desc: Chinchou, a dual-type Water and Electric Pokémon, is the first stage of its evolution line. It has an advantage against Fire, Ground, Flying, and Rock types but is weak to Electric.

name: Lanturn
desc: Lanturn, a dual-type Water and Electric Pokémon, excels against Fire, Ground, Flying, and Rock types but is weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Pichu
desc: Pichu, an Electric-type Pokémon, is the baby form of Pikachu. It has no specific strengths or weaknesses as its effectiveness depends on its moveset.

name: Cleffa
desc: Cleffa, a Fairy-type Pokémon, is the baby form of Clefairy. It has no specific strengths or weaknesses as its effectiveness depends on its moveset.

name: Igglybuff
desc: Igglybuff, a dual-type Normal and Fairy Pokémon, is the baby form of Jigglypuff. It has no specific strengths or weaknesses as its effectiveness depends on its moveset.

name: Sudowoodo
desc: Sudowoodo, a Rock-type Pokémon, has the ability Sturdy, preventing it from being knocked out in one hit. It excels against Fire, Flying, Ice, and Bug types but is weak to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

name: Politoed
desc: Politoed, a Water-type Pokémon, has the Drizzle ability, summoning rain when it enters battle. It excels against Fire, Ground, and Rock types but is weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Espeon
desc: Espeon, a Psychic-type Pokémon, has the Synchronize ability, passing on status conditions to opponents. It excels against Fighting and Poison types but is weak to Bug, Ghost, and Dark types.

name: Umbreon
desc: Umbreon, a Dark-type Pokémon, has the ability Synchronize, passing on status conditions to opponents. It excels against Psychic and Ghost types but is weak to Fighting and Bug types.

name: Murkrow
desc: Murkrow, a dual-type Dark and Flying Pokémon, is the first stage of its evolution line. It is strong against Ghost and Psychic types but is weak to Electric, Ice, Rock, and Fairy types.

name: Slowking
desc: Slowking, a dual-type Water and Psychic Pokémon, is known for its intelligence. It excels against Fire, Ground, Rock, and Fighting types but is weak to Electric, Grass, Bug, Ghost, and Dark types.

name: Misdreavus
desc: Misdreavus, a Ghost-type Pokémon, is the first stage of its evolution line. It is strong against Psychic and Ghost types but is weak to Dark types.

name: Snubbull
desc: Snubbull, a Fairy-type Pokémon, is the first stage of its evolution line. It is strong against Fighting and Dragon types but is weak to Poison and Steel types.

name: Granbull
desc: Granbull, a Fairy-type Pokémon, is known for its intimidating appearance. It is strong against Fighting and Dragon types but is weak to Poison and Steel types.

name: Scizor
desc: Scizor, a dual-type Bug and Steel Pokémon, has the ability Technician, boosting the power of its weaker moves. It excels against Grass, Psychic, and Dark types but is weak to Fire.

name: Sneasel
desc: Sneasel, a dual-type Dark and Ice Pokémon, is the first stage of its evolution line. It is strong against Psychic, Ghost, Dark, and Ice types but is weak to Fighting, Bug, Rock, Steel, Fire, and Fairy types.

name: Corsola
desc: Corsola, a dual-type Water and Rock Pokémon, is known for its vibrant colors. It excels against Fire, Ground, Rock, and Electric types but is weak to Fighting, Grass, Ground, and Electric types.

name: Delibird
desc: Delibird is an Ice/Flying type Pokémon with abilities Vital Spirit and Hustle. It excels against Grass, Ground, and Dragon types but is vulnerable to Electric, Rock, Steel, and Fire types.

name: Skarmory
desc: Skarmory is a Steel/Flying type Pokémon with abilities Sturdy and Keen Eye. It resists Normal, Grass, Ice, Psychic, Flying, Bug, Rock, and Dragon types but is weak to Electric and Fire types.

name: Porygon2
desc: Porygon2 is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Trace, Download, and the hidden ability Analytic. It is neutral against most types but is vulnerable to Fighting types.

name: Smeargle
desc: Smeargle is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Own Tempo, Technician, and the hidden ability Moody. Its strength lies in its versatile moveset, but it doesn't have inherent type advantages, and its stats are generally low.

name: Elekid
desc: Elekid is an Electric type Pokémon with abilities Static and the hidden ability Vital Spirit. It has an advantage against Water and Flying types but is weak to Ground types.

name: Magby
desc: Magby is a Fire type Pokémon with abilities Flame Body and the hidden ability Vital Spirit. It is strong against Grass, Bug, Steel, and Ice types but is weak to Water, Rock, and Ground types.

name: Miltank
desc: Miltank is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Thick Fat, Scrappy, and the hidden ability Sap Sipper. It is neutral against most types but is vulnerable to Fighting types.

name: Blissey
strengths: High HP and Special Defense stats
desc: Blissey is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Natural Cure, Serene Grace, and the hidden ability Healer. It boasts high HP and Special Defense stats, making it an excellent special wall, but it is vulnerable to Fighting types.

name: Wingull
desc: Wingull is a Water/Flying type Pokémon with abilities Keen Eye, Hydration, and the hidden ability Rain Dish. It is effective against Fire, Ground, and Rock types but is vulnerable to Electric types.

name: Pelipper
desc: Pelipper is a Water/Flying type Pokémon with abilities Keen Eye, Drizzle, and the hidden ability Rain Dish. It is effective against Fire, Ground, and Rock types but is vulnerable to Electric types.

name: Surskit
desc: Surskit is a Bug/Water type Pokémon with abilities Swift Swim and Rain Dish. It has an advantage against Grass, Electric, and Ground types but is weak to Flying, Rock, and Electric types.

name: Masquerain
desc: Masquerain is a Bug/Flying type Pokémon with abilities Intimidate and the hidden ability Unnerve. It excels against Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Bug types but is vulnerable to Fire, Electric, Ice, and Rock types.

name: Makuhita
desc: Makuhita is a Fighting type Pokémon with abilities Thick Fat, Guts, and the hidden ability Sheer Force. It is strong against Normal, Ice, Rock, Dark, and Steel types but is weak to Flying, Psychic, and Fairy types.

name: Hariyama
desc: Hariyama is a Fighting type Pokémon with abilities Thick Fat, Guts, and the hidden ability Sheer Force. It is strong against Normal, Ice, Rock, Dark, and Steel types but is weak to Flying, Psychic, and Fairy types.

name: Nosepass
desc: Nosepass is a Rock type Pokémon with abilities Sturdy, Magnet Pull, and the hidden ability Sand Force. It is effective against Fire, Ice, Flying, and Bug types but is vulnerable to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

name: Sableye
desc: Sableye is a Dark/Ghost type Pokémon with abilities Keen Eye, Stall, and the hidden ability Prankster. It excels against Ghost, Psychic, and Dark types but is vulnerable to Fairy types.

name: Carvanha
desc: Carvanha is a Water/Dark type Pokémon with abilities Rough Skin and the hidden ability Speed Boost. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, Dark, and Ghost types but is weak to Electric, Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Fairy types.

name: Sharpedo
desc: Sharpedo is a Water/Dark type Pokémon with abilities Rough Skin and the hidden ability Speed Boost. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, Dark, and Ghost types but is weak to Electric, Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Fairy types.

name: Wailmer
desc: Wailmer is a Water type Pokémon with abilities Water Veil, Oblivious, and the hidden ability Pressure. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but is weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Wailord
desc: Wailord is a Water type Pokémon with abilities Water Veil, Oblivious, and the hidden ability Pressure. It is strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but is weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Torkoal
desc: Torkoal is a Fire type Pokémon with abilities White Smoke and the hidden ability Drought. It excels against Fire, Grass, Ice, Bug, and Steel types but is vulnerable to Water and Rock types.

name: Spinda
desc: Spinda is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Own Tempo, Tangled Feet, and the hidden ability Contrary. It doesn't have a specific type advantage but is weak to Fighting types.

name: Trapinch
desc: Trapinch is a Ground type Pokémon with abilities Hyper Cutter, Arena Trap, and the hidden ability Sheer Force. It is effective against Fire, Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel types but is weak to Water, Grass, and Ice types.

name: Vibrava
desc: Vibrava is a Ground/Dragon type Pokémon with the ability Levitate. It has an advantage against Electric, Poison, Rock, Steel, Bug, and Dark types but is weak to Ice, Dragon, and Fairy types.

name: Flygon
desc: Flygon is a Ground/Dragon type Pokémon with the ability Levitate. It has an advantage against Electric, Poison, Rock, Steel, Bug, and Dark types but is weak to Ice, Dragon, and Fairy types.

name: Barboach
desc: Barboach is a Water/Ground type Pokémon with abilities Oblivious, Anticipation, and the hidden ability Hydration. It is effective against Fire, Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel types but is weak to Grass and Ice types.

name: Whiscash
desc: Whiscash is a Water/Ground type Pokémon with abilities Oblivious, Anticipation, and the hidden ability Hydration. It is effective against Fire, Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel types but is weak to Grass and Ice types.

name: Feebas
desc: Feebas is a Water type Pokémon with abilities Swift Swim, Oblivious, and the hidden ability Adaptability. It excels against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but is weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Milotic
desc: Milotic is a Water type Pokémon with abilities Marvel Scale, Competitive, and the hidden ability Cute Charm. It excels against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but is weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Castform
desc: Castform is a Normal type Pokémon with the ability Forecast. It doesn't have a specific type advantage but is weak to Rock types.

name: Absol
desc: Absol is a Dark type Pokémon with abilities Pressure, Super Luck, and the hidden ability Justified. It excels against Ghost, Psychic, and Dark types but is vulnerable to Fairy and Bug types.

name: Snorunt
desc: Snorunt is an Ice type Pokémon with abilities Inner Focus, Ice Body, and the hidden ability Moody. It is strong against Ice types but is weak to Fire, Fighting, Rock, and Steel types.

name: Glalie
desc: Glalie is an Ice type Pokémon with abilities Inner Focus, Ice Body, and the hidden ability Moody. It is strong against Ice types but is weak to Fire, Fighting, Rock, and Steel types.

name: Relicanth
desc: Relicanth is a Water/Rock type Pokémon with abilities Swift Swim, Rock Head, and the hidden ability Sturdy. It excels against Fire, Water, Ice, Flying, and Bug types but is weak to Electric, Grass, Fighting, and Ground types.

name: Luvdisc
desc: Luvdisc is a Water type Pokémon with abilities Swift Swim, Hydration, and the hidden ability Regenerator. It excels against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but is weak to Electric and Grass types.

name: Bagon
desc: Bagon is a Dragon type Pokémon with abilities Rock Head, Sheer Force, and the hidden ability Moxy. It has an advantage against Electric, Grass, Fighting, and Bug types but is weak to Ice, Dragon, and Fairy types.

name: Shelgon
desc: Shelgon is a Dragon type Pokémon with abilities Rock Head, Overcoat, and the hidden ability Moxy. It has an advantage against Electric, Grass, Fighting, and Bug types but is weak to Ice, Dragon, and Fairy types.

name: Salamence
desc: Salamence is a Dragon/Flying type Pokémon with abilities Intimidate and the hidden ability Moxie. It excels against Fighting, Bug, and Grass types but is weak to Ice, Dragon, Rock, and Fairy types. Salamence can Mega Evolve into Mega Salamence with the ability Aerilate.

name: Beldum
desc: Beldum is a Steel/Psychic type Pokémon with abilities Clear Body and the hidden ability Light Metal. It excels against Ice, Psychic, Rock, and Fairy types but is vulnerable to Ground, Ghost, Fire, and Dark types.

name: Metang
desc: Metang is a Steel/Psychic type Pokémon with abilities Clear Body and the hidden ability Light Metal. It excels against Ice, Psychic, Rock, and Fairy types but is vulnerable to Ground, Ghost, Fire, and Dark types.

name: Metagross
desc: Metagross is a Steel/Psychic type Pokémon with abilities Clear Body and the hidden ability Light Metal. It excels against Ice, Psychic, Rock, and Fairy types but is vulnerable to Ground, Ghost, Fire, and Dark types. Metagross can Mega Evolve into Mega Metagross with the ability Tough Claws.

name: Cranidos
desc: Cranidos is a Rock type Pokémon with abilities Mold Breaker and the hidden ability Sheer Force. It excels against Fire, Ice, Flying, and Bug types but is weak to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

name: Rampardos
desc: Rampardos is a Rock type Pokémon with abilities Mold Breaker and the hidden ability Sheer Force. It excels against Fire, Ice, Flying, and Bug types but is weak to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

name: Shieldon
desc: Shieldon is a Rock/Steel type Pokémon with abilities Sturdy and the hidden ability Soundproof. It has advantages against Normal, Fire, Ice, Flying, Bug, Rock, and Steel types but is weak to Water, Grass, Fighting, and Ground types.

name: Bastiodon
desc: Bastiodon is a Rock/Steel type Pokémon with abilities Sturdy and the hidden ability Soundproof. It has advantages against Normal, Fire, Ice, Flying, Bug, Rock, and Steel types but is weak to Water, Grass, Fighting, and Ground types.

name: Shellos
desc: Shellos is a Water type Pokémon with abilities Sticky Hold and the hidden ability Storm Drain. It has advantages against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but is weak to Grass and Electric types. Shellos has an East Sea form with the sprite suffix 'east'.

name: Gastrodon
desc: Gastrodon is a Water/Ground type Pokémon with abilities Sticky Hold and the hidden ability Storm Drain. It excels against Fire, Water, Ice, Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel types but is weak to Grass. Gastrodon has an East Sea form with the sprite suffix 'east'.

name: Drifloon
desc: Drifloon is a Ghost/Flying type Pokémon with abilities Aftermath and the hidden ability Unburden. It excels against Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Ground types but is vulnerable to Electric, Ice, Dark, Ghost, and Rock types.

name: Drifblim
desc: Drifblim is a Ghost/Flying type Pokémon with abilities Aftermath and the hidden ability Unburden. It excels against Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Ground types but is vulnerable to Electric, Ice, Dark, Ghost, and Rock types.

name: Mismagius
desc: Mismagius is a Ghost type Pokémon with the ability Levitate. It excels against Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Poison types but is weak to Ghost and Dark types.

name: Honchkrow
desc: Honchkrow is a Dark/Flying type Pokémon with abilities Insomnia, Super Luck, and the hidden ability Moxie. It excels against Ghost, Dark, Grass, and Psychic types but is vulnerable to Electric, Ice, Rock, and Fairy types.

name: Bonsly
desc: Bonsly is a Rock type Pokémon with abilities Sturdy, Rock Head, and the hidden ability Rattled. It excels against Fire, Ice, Flying, and Bug types but is weak to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

name: Happiny
desc: Happiny is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Natural Cure, Serene Grace, and the hidden ability Friend Guard. It has no specific type advantages but is weak to Fighting types.

name: Gible
desc: Gible is a Dragon/Ground type Pokémon with abilities Sand Veil and the hidden ability Rough Skin. It excels against Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel types but is weak to Ice, Dragon, and Fairy types.

name: Gabite
desc: Gabite is a Dragon/Ground type Pokémon with abilities Sand Veil and the hidden ability Rough Skin. It excels against Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel types but is weak to Ice, Dragon, and Fairy types.

name: Garchomp
desc: Garchomp is a Dragon/Ground type Pokémon with abilities Sand Veil and the hidden ability Rough Skin. It excels against Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel types but is weak to Ice, Dragon, and Fairy types. Garchomp has a Mega Evolution with the sprite suffix 'mega'.

name: Munchlax
desc: Munchlax is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Pick Up, Thick Fat, and the hidden ability Gluttony. It has no specific type advantages but is weak to Fighting types.

name: Riolu
desc: Riolu is a Fighting type Pokémon with abilities Steadfast, Inner Focus, and the hidden ability Prankster. It excels against Rock, Bug, and Dark types but is weak to Flying, Psychic, and Fairy types.

name: Lucario
desc: Lucario is a Fighting/Steel type Pokémon with abilities Steadfast, Inner Focus, and the hidden ability Justified. It excels against Rock, Bug, Ice, and Fairy types but is weak to Fighting, Ground, and Fire types. Lucario has a Mega Evolution with the sprite suffix 'mega'.

name: Finneon
desc: Finneon is a Water type Pokémon with abilities Swift Swim, Storm Drain, and the hidden ability Water Veil. It excels against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but is weak to Grass and Electric types.

name: Lumineon
desc: Lumineon is a Water type Pokémon with abilities Swift Swim, Storm Drain, and the hidden ability Water Veil. It excels against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel types but is weak to Grass and Electric types.

name: Weavile
desc: Weavile is a Dark/Ice type Pokémon with abilities Pressure and the hidden ability Pickpocket. It excels against Psychic, Ghost, Dark, and Ice types but is weak to Fighting, Fire, Steel, Rock, Bug, and Fairy types.

name: Magnezone
desc: Magnezone is an Electric/Steel type Pokémon with abilities Magnet Pull, Sturdy, and the hidden ability Analytic. It excels against Electric, Flying, Steel, and Ice types but is weak to Ground and Fire types.

name: Electivire
desc: Electivire is an Electric type Pokémon with abilities Motor Drive and the hidden ability Vital Spirit. It excels against Electric, Flying, and Steel types but is weak to Ground types.

name: Magmortar
desc: Magmortar is a Fire type Pokémon with abilities Flame Body and the hidden ability Vital Spirit. It excels against Fire, Grass, Ice, Bug, and Steel types but is weak to Water and Rock types.

name: Leafeon
desc: Leafeon is a Grass type Pokémon with abilities Leaf Guard and the hidden ability Chlorophyll. It excels against Water, Electric, Grass, and Ground types but is weak to Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, and Bug types.

name: Glaceon
desc: Glaceon is an Ice type Pokémon with abilities Snow Cloak and the hidden ability Ice Body. It excels against Ice types but is weak to Fire, Fighting, Rock, and Steel types.

name: Porygon-Z
desc: Porygon-Z is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Adaptability, Download, and the hidden ability Analytic. It has no specific type advantages but is weak to Fighting types.

name: Probopass
desc: Probopass is a Rock/Steel type Pokémon with abilities Sturdy, Magnet Pull, and the hidden ability Sand Force. It excels against Normal, Fire, Flying, Poison, Ice, Rock, Bug, Psychic, Dragon, Steel, and Fairy types but is weak to Fighting, Ground, and Water types.

name: Froslass
desc: Froslass is an Ice/Ghost type Pokémon with abilities Snow Cloak and the hidden ability Cursed Body. It excels against Ice, Ghost, Dark, Normal, Fighting, and Poison types but is weak to Fire, Steel, Rock, and Ghost types.

name: Lillipup
desc: Lillipup is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Vital Spirit, Pick Up, and the hidden ability Run Away. It has no specific type advantages but is weak to Fighting types.

name: Herdier
desc: Herdier is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Intimidate, Sand Rush, and the hidden ability Scrappy. It has no specific type advantages but is weak to Fighting types.

name: Stoutland
desc: Stoutland is a Normal type Pokémon with abilities Intimidate, Sand Rush, and the hidden ability Scrappy. It has no specific type advantages but is weak to Fighting types.

name: Roggenrola
desc: Roggenrola is a Rock type Pokémon with abilities Sturdy, Weak Armor, and the hidden ability Sand Force. It excels against Normal, Fire, Poison, and Flying types but is weak to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

name: Boldore
desc: Boldore is a Rock type Pokémon with abilities Sturdy, Weak Armor, and the hidden ability Sand Force. It excels against Normal, Fire, Poison, and Flying types but is weak to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

name: Gigalith
desc: Gigalith is a Rock type Pokémon with abilities Sturdy, Sand Stream, and the hidden ability Sand Force. It excels against Normal, Fire, Poison, and Flying types but is weak to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel types.

name: Cottonee
desc: Cottonee is a Grass/Fairy type Pokémon with abilities Prankster, Infiltrator, and the hidden ability Chlorophyll. It excels against Water, Electric, Grass, Ground, Fighting, Dragon, and Dark types but is weak to Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, and Steel types.

name: Whimsicott
desc: Whimsicott is a Grass/Fairy type Pokémon with abilities Prankster, Infiltrator, and the hidden ability Chlorophyll. It excels against Water, Electric, Grass, Ground, Fighting, Dragon, and Dark types but is weak to Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, and Steel types.

name: Petilil
desc: Petilil is a Grass type Pokémon with abilities Chlorophyll, Own Tempo, and the hidden ability Leaf Guard. It excels against Water, Electric, Grass, and Ground types but is weak to Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, and Bug types.

name: Lilligant
desc: Lilligant is a Grass type Pokémon with abilities Chlorophyll, Own Tempo, and the hidden ability Leaf Guard. It excels against Water, Electric, Grass, and Ground types but is weak to Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, and Bug types.

name: Sandile
desc: Sandile is a Ground/Dark type Pokémon with abilities Intimidate, Moxie, and the hidden ability Anger Point. It excels against Fire, Electric, Poison, Rock, Steel, and Dark types but is weak to Water, Grass, Ice, Fighting, Bug, and Fairy types.

name: Krokorok
desc: Krokorok is a Ground/Dark type Pokémon with abilities Intimidate, Moxie, and the hidden ability Anger Point. It excels against Fire, Electric, Poison, Rock, Steel, and Dark types but is weak to Water, Grass, Ice, Fighting, Bug, and Fairy types.

name: Krookodile
desc: Krookodile is a Ground/Dark type Pokémon with abilities Intimidate, Moxie, and the hidden ability Anger Point. It excels against Fire, Electric, Poison, Rock, Steel, and Dark types but is weak to Water, Grass, Ice, Fighting, Bug, and Fairy types.

name: Tirtouga
desc: Tirtouga is a Water/Rock type Pokémon with abilities Solid Rock, Sturdy, and the hidden ability Swift Swim. It excels against Normal, Fire, Poison, Flying, Ice, Bug, Rock, Steel, and Water types but is weak to Grass, Electric, Fighting, and Ground types.

name: Carracosta
desc: Carracosta is a Water/Rock type Pokémon with abilities Solid Rock, Sturdy, and the hidden ability Swift Swim. It excels against Normal, Fire, Poison, Flying, Ice, Bug, Rock, Steel, and Water types but is weak to Grass, Electric, Fighting, and Ground types.

name: Archen
desc: Archen is a Rock/Flying type Pokémon with the ability Defeatist. It excels against Normal, Fire, Poison, Flying, Ice, Bug, and Rock types but is weak to Water, Electric, Ice, Rock, and Steel types.

name: Archeops
desc: Archeops is a Rock/Flying type Pokémon.

name: Trubbish
desc: Trubbish is a Poison type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Garbodor
desc: Garbodor is a Poison type Pokémon.

name: Vanillite
desc: Vanillite is an Ice type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Vanillish
desc: Vanillish is an Ice type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Vanilluxe
desc: Vanilluxe is an Ice type Pokémon.

name: Emolga
desc: Emolga is an Electric/Flying type Pokémon.

name: Alomomola
desc: Alomomola is a Water type Pokémon.

name: Rufflet
desc: Rufflet is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Braviary
desc: Braviary is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon.

name: Vullaby
desc: Vullaby is a Dark/Flying type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Mandibuzz
desc: Mandibuzz is a Dark/Flying type Pokémon.

name: Fletchling
desc: Fletchling is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Fletchinder
desc: Fletchinder is a Fire/Flying type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Talonflame
desc: Talonflame is a Fire/Flying type Pokémon.

name: Pancham
desc: Pancham is a Fighting type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Pangoro
desc: Pangoro is a Fighting/Dark type Pokémon.

name: Sylveon
desc: Sylveon is a Fairy type Pokémon.

name: Carbink
desc: Carbink is a Rock/Fairy type Pokémon.

name: Goomy
desc: Goomy is a Dragon type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Sliggoo
desc: Sliggoo is a Dragon type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Goodra
desc: Goodra is a Dragon type Pokémon.

name: Klefki
desc: Klefki is a Steel/Fairy type Pokémon.

name: Phantump
desc: Phantump is a Ghost/Grass type Pokémon that is not fully evolved.

name: Trevenant
desc: Trevenant is a Ghost/Grass type Pokémon.

name: Zygarde
desc: Zygarde is a Dragon/Ground type Pokémon and is a Legendary Pokémon. It has multiple forms, including Zygarde Complete and Zygarde 10%.
